Sentencas: The potential of the wet powder spraying (WPS) process for the deposition of thin dense films for solid oxide fuel cell electrolytes is demonstrated.
Titulo: Thin electrolyte layers for SOFC via wet powder spraying (WPS)

Sentencas: In contrast to many other production methods the process allows high deposition rates.
Titulo: Thin electrolyte layers for SOFC via wet powder spraying (WPS)

Sentencas: Economical aspects such as good up-scaling, low investment costs for the equipment and short sintering times for the layes make the WPS process an interesting alternative to other deposition techniques.
Titulo: Thin electrolyte layers for SOFC via wet powder spraying (WPS)
